text: Half a dozen abandoned shacks and a boarded up gas statio make up the central hub of Laughter, Colorado. She'd be a ghost town a cept the ghosts considered her a shithole ag ago and baled. The buck ten for leaded sign gives us an i how long ago this place went dry. Suddenly an old Chevy RIPS around the corner, wheels send PLUMES of dust skyward.

Three grimy looking fuckers are stuffed into the cab. FUCKING DRIVER looks as though he may piss himself. FUCKI MIDDLE twists around, glares through the back glass and FUCKING PASSENGER white-knuckles a tire iron.
Goddamned old man!
I thought he was dead! She said he was dead!
I don't see him. Just go. I think we lost him.

They race through the dusty derelict little town, peeling the main road in the distance when they round a corner -- --to face a a 70 PLYMOUTH ROADRUNNER, beat to shit, engin screaming. SPEEDING head on. This ain't chicken because these three Fuckers don't even have time to react before:

aThe Old Mana, shock of white hair, drives the Roadrunner locks the tires and spins the wheel. The Roadrunner fishtails, slides sideways AT THEM! The truck's gonna ram the driver's side. At least it woul

MILTON AIMS A SHOTGUN through the driver's side window. Fearless. Pissed off. He FIRES! 2. The shot BLOOMS right at us! Then SLOWS TO NEAR FROZEN - Hanging in mid-air - suspended, like we could touch it: TITLE CARD appears--
--then the shot BURSTS through the title! SHATTERING the words right at us!

...EXPLODING into the hood of the Chevy! The hood RIPS up SLAMS the windshield. Truck CAREENS out of control! Milton GUNS the Roadrunner away from truck...but... KRAACK - The Truck nails the Roadrunner's rear quarter pa Roadrunner and truck go into a spin. A tornado of dust SWIRLS around the two vehicles. The Roadrunner SPLINTERS into a boarded store front! The Truck HITS a ditch and UPENDS. Flips. SLAMS into the dirt on its roof, wheels SPINNING.

Smoke HISSES from the totalled Roadrunner. Door creeks op Milton emerges slow and sure. He crosses toward the Chevy Fucking Passenger rises from behind the truck and rushes Milton, tire iron held high over his head! Milton spins and KUH-FOOM! --blows Fucking Passenger's hand clean off! Passenger screams as Milton snatches the iron out of the air and --
-- slams it across his face! Passenger drops. Hard. Milton stoops, removes Passenger's wallet, digs the cash
Fucking Driver scrambles from behind the wheel, springs t his feet and runs. 3. Milton spins, BLOWS his knee apart from 20 paces. Driver SCREAMS and face-firsts the cracked pavement.
As Fucking Middle drags himself from the passenger side. got the worst of it. Looks like his face went through the windshield. He looks up -- -- into the barrel of Milton's shotgun. A beat.
I'll never tell you where they've taken her...NEVER.
I know. The EXPLOSION vaporizes what's left of his face.
As he tries to stand but his lower leg dangles from a pie of cartilage. He falls, WRITHES on the ground. He looks u at Milton standing over him.
You...you took my leg you fuck! Milton presses the shotgun barrel into the man's good kne
Wait. Wait!
Where is she?
I...I don't... Suddenly Fucking Passenger, flattened by the tire iron, s up, dazed. Sees Milton. Spots the iron. Goes for it. Milton spins and KAFOOM! Blows Fucking Passenger to hell.

Stillwater! Stillwater Marsh! I don't know where exactly. They call it Wolf Deer Run, that's all I know. I swear! 4. Milton digs Driver's cell phone out...stares at it for a moment, drops it, finds wallet, takes cash.
But you're too late. You gotta know that. Next full moon she's dead. Nothing you can do. She's dead and hell will walk the earth--
Milton shoves the barrel of his shotgun into the man's mo breaking a couple teeth in the process. Milton hisses, his throat dry, like a man who hasn't quen his thirst in a decade.

You tell him I'm coming. You got that? I'm coming to get her back. You tell him. Tell him I'm gonna kill every last one of you fuckers. Milton turns on his heels. Walks into the dust and doesn' look back.
Black smoke billows from the BBQ of this shithole diner. It's the only building as far as the eye can see. The lot dotted with vehicles past their prime. A muscle bound a 6 GTO stands out.

Covered in a thick layer of cooking grease, this is one o those diners where white trash goes to die. Half a dozen PATRONS sit at bar and booth as a young American Indian couple, MARY and DALE, enter with their children 2, 4 and Two waitresses, PIPER (25) and NORMAJEAN (57) stand at th kitchen pick-up window. Through which we can see the joint's owner, FAT LOU, dripping sweat into a pile of scrambled eggs. Fat Lou is fat. Holy fuck fat.
So I tell him, I says, aFrank, that's it. No more free milk. You gonna have to buy the cow you son of a bitch.a 5.
But you're not fat, Piper
Wha? No, NormaJean, abuy the cow.a Marry me? He's got to marry me. I'm sayin I cut him off.
You cut him off?
Not just yes but hell yes! No tits, no ass. And I told him if I see that big ol' dick of his anywhere near my face I'm gonna bite it in half. Normajean giggles with embarrassment.
You said that? How long's it been? Piper frowns.
Well, it's only been two days but that's like a decade in horny fucker years.
So he bought you a diamond?

A diamond? God no. If Frank had money for a diamond I would have jacked his sorry ass ages ago and put this shithole life in the rear view. But he did get down on his knees and ask me to be his bride.
No way.
Yes way! NormaJean grabs Piper in a great big hug.
Oh! Piper! 6.
Something yellow peppers them both. The girls look up as Fat Lou SLAMS two plates of food into the window.
Did...did you just throw scrambled eggs at us?

I don't pay you bitches to stand around. Now get the fuck back to work! Piper snatches one of the plates. She delivers it to a Patron sitting at the bar, then turn toward the newly arrived customers. The American Indian couple scans a menu... ...and Milton (the old guy from our opening) scans her... quickly looks down at an unfolded map of Colorado as -- NormaJean steps up to Milton.
Hello beautiful, coffee?
That'd be great. Tell me, Stillwater Marsh around here?

(shrugs) Stillwater...doesn't ring a bell. I'll get that coffee. But Milton makes eye contact with Mary, the Indian mother She quickly looks away. She knows something... Milton opens his mouth to speak as-- --Piper approaches the American Indian couple.
Hi guys, I'm Piper. Can I bring you something to drink?
We'll take this. 7. Mary points to the menu, Piper leans in, reads.
aShe's a Brickhousea breakfast. Ten monster flapjacks for 4.99.
And five waters.
Five waters. And what can I get for... Father averts his eyes. He's embarrassed.
That's it. Just the pancakes. If that's okay? Piper stares at them as if for the first time. Shit... they're hungry. And broke.

Oh. Of course. Coming right up. Piper shoots Milton a look as she crosses to the kitchen. Milton rises slightly. He's clearly trying to get Mary's attention. She's ignoring him. Piper calls through the window to Fat Lou.
One brickhouse. She turns and stops suddenly. Stares at a pile of muffins kept fresh within a glass cake stand.
Mary can no longer avoid Milton's stare.
Stillwater Marsh? You know it? Dale, the father, keeps his back to Milton as he speaks.
No. We don't.
It's important. 8.
You're in the wrong state.
Mary!
And what state Should I be in? Dale turns, glares at Milton.
Nevada. Catch the 50 and cut across. It's a two day drive from here.
And Wolf Deer Run?
Never heard of it. The 7 year old LITTLE GIRL'S eyes brighten.
Yes you have daddy. Wolf Deer Run, that's where The Smiling Man takes the wicked children to see the Mother of all things. Mary SHUSHES her Little Girl and pulls her close.
Mother of all things, that sounds very interesting.
Oh it is! The Mother of all things bleeds black tears unto those who
Mother places her hand over her daughter's mouth.
It's nothing. Just a story parents tell to their children. Like the boogey-man or the tooth-fairy. A plate filled with muffins thumps down before them. Pipe leans in with three kiddie cups.
And three milks. 9.
But we didn't order--
(whispers) --On the house. She winks and moves away...eyeing the kitchen window. She doesn't notice...
staring at her again. An impressed smirk on his face. Suddenly NormaJean steps in front of him.
So, aren't you gonna ask what time my shift ends? Full moon tonight. I'm always a little a randy' during full moon.
Full moon's three days off.
(she touches his hand) You sure a bout that, sweetie?
Pretty sure. (looks outside) Hell of a ride out there. Yours?
The GTO? I wish.
(glances at Piper) Hers?
Sure but if you're lookin' for a ride...
And would you be gentle?
Life's too short for that, sweetie.
Piper enters with two dirty plates, scrapes them and drop them into a soapy sink. She turns right into -- 10.
He glares down at her.
Jesus Lou, back the fuck off.
aOn the housea? On the fucking house?
Oh relax. We gotta toss them muffins out today anyway. She sidesteps him, exits the kitchen.
As Piper crosses toward the bar, Lou grabs her from behin spins her around.
Get your hand off of me! His fat fingers tighten around her shoulder.

You get over there and you charge them for those muff... Piper strikes. Like a snake. Her hand reaches beneath the fat of his belly and vice grips his balls. Hell, we even hear the CRUNCH. Fat Lou GASPS and doubles over allowing Piper to SLAM her forehead into the bridge of his nose!
I told you, you fat fuck son of a bitch, never to touch me again! His nose seeps blood.
Let...go...of...my... She SLAPS him across the face with her free hand. 11.
Shut up. She takes a step backwards, but keeps her hand clamped to nuts. He has no choice but follow. She pulls him up to the American Indian family.
Tell'em.
Wha...what? We see it in her face. She squeezes. Lou's eyes go wide...flutter...he's about to pass out.
Tell them...the muffins...are on the house.
On. The. House. She lets go. Lou drops to his knees, then timbers to the floor as Piper turns to the family. The children are huddled, terrified against their parents

I'm sorry your kids had to see that. Put some honey butter on those bran muffins and they taste an awful lot better. Piper turns and crosses toward the door. NormaJean is pale as she watches her go. Piper brushes past Milton's booth. His cup is there but Milton is gone.

We're close on a car door as it SLAMS. CLOSE ON GLASS PACK EXHAUST PIPES as the car RUMBLES with life. An aI brake for pussya bumper sticker stands out. THE BACK GLASS vibrates as MUSIC blares from within. 12.
Piper's French manicured hand wraps the floor-mounted gea shift like a cock and SLAMS it into drive.
With Piper behind the wheel the GTO tears onto the highwa ...and blows passed Milton, as he walks west, duffle bag thrown over his shoulder.
Piper SINGS. She's empowered. Then... KA-THUNK. She grips the wheel. The RPMS drop.

The GTO pulls off the road...white smoke HISSES from bene the hood. CLOSE ON ENGINE as the hood POPS. Piper waves a hand in front of her face as the smoke devo her. She COUGHS. Stares. It's clear she don't know jack shit about engines. FOOTSTEPS. Piper slips the keys between her fingers. Read Milton appears through the smoke.
Car trouble? Piper stares. It's the way he said it. Too knowing. Milton glances at the engine.
Oh, that's not so bad. I can fix that for you if you like. 13.
I would. Thank you.
If you give me a lift.
I'm only going as far as Blackfoot Falls. The truckstop there.
And I'd be much obliged. Milton leans in, flicks something then rises and THUMPS t hood shut with a smile.
Shall we?
Piper behind the wheel focuses on the road. Milton sits i the passenger seat, hugs his duffle bag, glances at Piper Suddenly Piper turns on him.
Get it straight old man. I ain't sleeping with you. Milton chuckles.
Darlin, my days of bedding a gal ten minutes after I meet her are over.
Yeah. Well, that's good to hear.
For now, anyway.

Several big rigs are parked near the truck stop. A few derelict vehicles outside the adjacent run down old motel Piper's GTO pulls in and parks near the road. 14. Piper climbs out. Milton rises stiffly and crosses toward her as he tosses the duffle over his shoulder. He offers hand, gives her a smile.
a Preciate the ride, ma'am. Milton crosses toward an old Superman style phone booth.
Piper inserts her key, glances back at Milton. He's in the booth now, his back to her. Piper turns the key and opens the door.
First thing we see is MONA'S naked ass and back. Long red hair, she is riding a naked FRANK. Neither realizes Piper has opened the door.
Oh Frank, you know how long I've wanted to feel you inside me?
Faster.

Oh, you want it faster? Mona thrusts her pelvic the tiniest bit faster. Suddenly Piper's hand clinches a handful of red hair and yanks! Mona SCREAMS in pain, Frank YELPS in fear as Piper drags Mona backwards off the bed.
Piper drags Mona, KICKING and SCREAMING, into the lot, th drops her and whirls toward the room-- -- where Frank struggles, desperate to find his pants.
What's the matter with you?! You psycho bitch from... 15. Piper spins on Mona, points a finger in warning.
Don't. It shuts Mona up. Piper storms back toward the room.
Frank hops with one leg in his jeans. He sees her coming. Although he's a big fella, he looks scared. Suddenly Mona steps in front of Piper and SLAPS her acros the face!
Fuck you, Piper, we're in lo--
Piper clocks Mona! Mona stands there...dazed. Swaying. Confused.
What was that? I didn't catch that last word.
Oh...I...I said...we're in lo--
This time Mona stumbles backwards and CRASHES into a meta chair on the motel porch. Piper brushes passed her.
Piper stuffs a gym bag with clothes.
Now baby, just hold on.
I'm warning you, Frank. Don't come near me. 16.
Look, sooner you accept this is your fault, the better. Piper stops, turns, stares.

Baby, I can't just turn it off. Now you know that. I gotta have it. At least once a day. It's in the wiring. You did this. You made me cheat on you. You're lucky I'm not more pissed about it. Piper stares for a moment. It's like she's been sucker punched. Then she zips her bag and crosses to the door.
Piper! Now cut it out. Enough with the drama!
Milton watches Piper's room. It's clear the phone to his is a fake out. Suddenly a look crosses his face. He jerks around.
...the garage. A grimy looking GREASE MONKEY is staring a Milton, cell phone to his ear. He sees Milton see him, quickly backs into the shadows.
Piper!
Piper exits, glances at Mona, sprawled out unconscious in metal chair, an ASIAN MAN in a Hawaiian shirt SNAPS pictu of her. Piper snatches the camera and flings it against the wall where it SHATTERS.
Pervert. Piper stomps across the lot as Frank exits, calls to her.
Baby, Please. Now hold on. Can we talk about this? Piper keeps walking. Never looks back.
Piper, stop this! You got nowhere to go and you know it.
I'll go to San Francisco and stay with my cousin.
(Realization) Whoa. You ain't taking my car. Piper pulls out the keys, twirls them on her finger.
I said, you ain't taking my car, bitch. Frank grabs her by the shoulder. Piper spins and --
-- punches him in the face. Caught off guard, Frank stumbles, nearly goes down.

Your car?! Who's been making the payments you out of work, skanky Mona fucking piece of shit?! She drops the gym bag and launches into him. A blur of FI and CLAWS. The tears flow. Heartbreak, anger, humiliation Frank stumble backwards. Tries to block the blows. WHAM!
Stop...
...hitting me! 18. She swings but this time Frank lashes out.
He punches her in the face. Hard. She drops to her hands and knees. When she looks up, her teeth are caked in bloo
You're insane, you know that? Look what you made me do! She staggers to her feet, sways before him.

Come on, I'll get you some ice-- She SPITS blood in his face and SWINGS! He blocks the blow and BACKHANDS her with the force of thunder. She spins and SLAMS into the ground. Doubtful she'll get up this time, then --
Frank stares as Piper rolls over.
Frank. Sweetie. I'm gonna tell everybody what I caught you doing with my pink dildo. Her laughter becomes a hysterical fit.
That's it. He drops on top of her, his fingers curl into a fist.
You don't wanna fuck me? Fine. When I'm done nobody's gonna wanna fuck you. Ever.
Go to hell. Frank raises his fist into the air. Then...
Hey. Frank looks up as a boot catches him under the chin, lift him off Piper. 19. Piper stares through blurry eyes as Milton drops on top o Frank, pounding him with his fists. FADE TO BLACK.
The sun is a glow to the west. The horizon dances and shimmers. Then...is that...yes. Someone is out there. Walking toward us. As if they appeared within the heat.
We start close to the ground. Dress shoes. Suit pants.

The ACCOUNTANT. Least he sure as shit looks like an accountant in blue suit and purple power tie. Not especia large. Nice looking face. Something trustworthy about him Friendly even. He loosens his tie, slips his jacket off and tosses it ov his shoulder. There's a bounce in his step.
NormaJean looks up as the Accountant enters.

Have a seat sweetie. Mary there will be right with you. Indian Mother Mary turns. Piper's replacement. She stops her tracks. Stares at the Accountant. He winks at her. A shiver runs through Mother Mary. She backs away then rushes from the diner.
Mary?! Fat Lou leans from the Kitchen window.
Where's she going? 20. The Accountant turns to Lou. Stares. Then --
You. Fat fuck. Come here. Lou stares.
What did you call me? The Accountant smiles. Fat Lou vanishes from the window then BURSTS from the kit
I said, what did you call--
--I called you a fat fuck' and we had better leave it at that unless you'd prefer I call you a dead fat fuck.'
Wha-what?
I'm looking for someone. An old man. White hair. Five-eleven. The Accountant smells the air, embraces it.
He was here earlier. Traveling light. Likely on foot.
Who are you?
I'm the Accountant.
That's supposed to mean something to me?

It will if I add you to the books. And if you don't tell me what I want to know... NormaJean opens her mouth to speak. Shuts it. 21. The Accountant turns to her, quickly. So quickly she take step back.
You had something to say?
He was here. Earlier.
Yes. We've established that.
Terrible tipper.
I'm sure he was. Where did he go? She points.
That way. West. On foot.
The GTO THUNDERS past.

Piper is curled up in a fetal position in the big back se She sits up slowly. Her eyes are blackened. But clearly Milton has cleaned her up. She props herself on an elbow, looks at the jacket covering her. Milton is driving. He gazes out the window...up to the sk Piper looks. The MOON hangs a few days from full. Piper slides over the seat, drags Milton's jacket with he then slips into it, wrapping herself as if cold.
Want me to roll the window up?
You didn't kill him did you? 22.
No but he'll likely piss blood for a day or two.
Thanks for that.
Hungry? He gestures through the windshield as they pass a aWelcom Utaha sign. Beyond, there are lights ahead.
Utah?
You mentioned San Francisco.
Appreciate what you done for me back there but I ain't takin you all the way to--
--My business is in Nevada. Can you get me that far?
What business?
I'm looking for someone. You hungry or not? Piper considers for a moment, then--
Yeah. I could eat.
Name's Milton. You're Piper, right?
You try to kill me and dump me in the desert I'll cut your nuts off.
Fair enough. 23.

location: BULL BY THE BALLS BAR AND GRILL

text: Pool tables, old pin ball machines and an odd mix of BIKE COWBOYS and the SLUTS who love them. Piper and Milton slide into a booth. Piper eyes a Latino BUSBOY, nice biceps, jeans too tight. ROY, a greasy fella in his fifties approaches, big happy looking fucker, owns the joint.
Greetings folks, welcome to the Bull by the Balls... He stops. Smile fades. Stares at Milton, mouth agape.
Roy.
Milton? Roy doesn't even try to hide his dislike of Milton.
Thought you were dead.
You hoped I was dead. Not the same.
You planning on staying? Milton eyes a door marked aMotel Guestsa.
Got a problem with that?
Your money's good as any Ia spect. But be gone by dawn. With Roy turns his back on them and walks away.
What was that all about?
Back in another life I used to drive a truck through these parts. 24.
And you'd spend the night here?
I'd spend the night here fucking his wife. Suddenly Milton twists around, stares toward the bar.
What's wrong?
I...nothing I guess. A large breasted waitress, fuckin' hot for a woman in her fifties, approaches with chips and salsa. Eyes Milton.
Well, hello. I'm Candy. Start you off with some drinks?
Beer.
Same. Candy plops two pens and index cards on the table.
And I'll need to see your IDs. Piper pulls her license absently and slides it over, begi filling out the card.
What is this?
Guess it's been awhile since you drove that truck through here.
You want a drink? You gotta be a member. Dry county.
You're kidding.
Welcome to Utah, Mr... 25. She takes his license.
Call me Milton.
This license isn't just expired. It's an antique.
Fine, then bring me a milk. She tosses his card on the table.
For you, gorgeous, we'll break the rules. Shhhh, don't tell nobody. Milton watches her go. Drinking her up.
You gonna tap that?
Tap what?
Jeez, Milton, how long's it been? Sounds like you used to stick it in anything with a crack.
Yeah. Well. I've been distracted.

Suit yourself. But nobody reaches the end and says, aWish I hadn't fucked so much.a Milton's gaze returns to Candy. Even a man as driven as h needs a reboot sometimes. Candy catches his look, smiles. Piper slides from the booth.
Where are you...?
I'm gonna do my nails, take a hot bath and sleep in a warm bed.
What about your beer? 26.

You drink it. See you at dawn. But she walks right passed the aMotel Guestsa door and approaches the Busboy, who's already eyeing her. As she does, our focus settles on a shadowy area at the b of the bar. JONAH KING steps into the light. Ruggedly goo looking. He wears a necklace with something bulky hidden beneath his shirt. There's an old scar under his left eye but a scar on this guy simply adds to his fuckabilty fact He glances at Milton then --
It's Roy isn't it? Roy spins from the bar, smiles a friendly smile.
Sure is. Get you a drink friend?
Fantastic place you have here. You don't happen to rent it out for parties do you?
We sure do. You planing a party? Again Jonah glances at Milton.
Oh yes. Tonight, in fact.

The Television chatters away with local nightly news. Fra ignores it, paces on the phone. As he does, we see Jonah King's face on the TV. The same guy from the bar. Archive footage of him preaching, warm, friendly. 27.

Mom...Mom...Mom! Would you Reverend Jonah King, the self- shut up and listen?! I've proclaimed prophet whose lost her for good this time. church has come under fire She's gone. I just want my for his anti-establishment car back. (a beat) messages, is wanted for Because...because...arrrg! questioning in the brutal Because I smacked her one, murder of the young parents. okay?!. Smacked her a couple While police say this is a of times, in fact. (a beat) routine questioning witnesses You don't think I know that?! place King in the area and Mom...Mom! It's over! End of have recently learned that story. She ain't coming King had a prior relationship back. Mom...mom...Mom! with one of the deceased.
I gotta go. Frank clicks his phone shut, jerks the door open to find The Accountant smiling at him.
There was an old man, yes?
Wha? The Accountant sniffs the air.
White hair. Angry with attitude.
Sumbitch kicked me in the face. Who are you?
I'm the Accountant.
The wha? I called the cops, not a bean-counter?
The old man? Where did he go?
Fuck should I know where he went? I woke up and all three were gone. 28.
All three?
The bitch, the old man and my car!
What kind of car?

You know what, fuck you. You ain't no cop. I'm done talking. Frank starts to close the door but the Accountant grabs h wrist, twists him around and shoves him into the room! Frank doesn't stumble forward. He flies. Lifted off the ground his toes drag the floor, Frank SLAMS into the oppo wall and bounces into the dresser.
You son of a -- Frank staggers to his feet. Dazed. Mouth bleeding. He wipes blood onto the back of his hand.
You...you made me bleed. Frank pulls a baseball bat from behind the dresser.

You leave me no choice but to beat you with this Louisville Slugger. Frank takes a step, swings at the Accountant. The Accountant dodges. Bat SMASHES down on the TV. SPARKS & GLASS fly. The Accountant STOMPS on the bat, SNAPS it in two. SLOMO: The short end rips from Frank's hands, knocks him backwards. The piece spins in the air - for a second, han there until... The Accountant snatches it, letting his follow-through ga momentum. Frank can only watch as the Accountant -

head_text.subj: HURLS THE JAGGED TIP OF THE BAT RIGHT AT HIM --

text: The tip STRIKES Frank in the shoulder with such force, it impales him up to the knob. Drives him backwards where it embeds into the wall! The Accountant grabs the broken barrel end of the bat, to it from hand to hand with a loud SLAP of flesh on wood.
What kind of car?
(dazed) I...what?
Your car. What kind is it? Frank stares down at the bat protruding from his shoulder
Wha...what did you do? The Accountant reaches out and twists the bat. Frank SCRE out in pain.
Answer the question.
A a 67 GTO! Arrgg! The Accountant turns and walks toward the door. Stops to a framed photo of Piper and Frank on the dresser.
Hey! Just hold on! The Accountant pivots and flings the barrel of the bat.

It's coming right at his face. Frank tries to dodge...twi his head...no good. The other end of the broken bat RAMS through his face, PI his head to the wall. The words Louisville Slugger just visible where Frank's face should be.
The Accountant exits as two STATE TROOPERS approach, thei vehicle parked behind them. 30.
Frank Raimi?
You called about a stolen car? The Accountant gestures over his shoulder.
In there. Trooper #1 moves toward the opened door. The Accountant steps in front of Trooper #2.
I'm looking for someone. Five- eleven. White hair. Driving a a 67 GTO. He's traveling with her. He hands Trooper #2 the framed photo.

Excuse me? The Accountant pulls a shiny, ancient coin, worn from bei worried over the years, from his pocket. He tosses it, th coin catching the light, glinting madly. Trooper #2 stare it. Can't seem to take his eyes off it. Trooper #1's eyes widen as he stares into Frank's room.
Jesus. He pulls his gun. Points it at the Accountant.
Keep your hands where I can see them!

Troopers, this is your lucky day. Trooper #2 is watching the hypnotic glinting coin. ANGLE - High looking down on the trio as the coin spins r in front of us - we glimpse the ancient face in the worn silver - Roman maybe?

Show us your hands, asshole. (to his partner) What's the matter with you?! Draw your weapon! 31. Trooper #2 slowly reaches for his gun until... The Accountant snatches the coin from the sky, thrusts it the two cops.
Here. Look at this. They don't see a coin. But a badge. Letters F.B.I. on it.
You're... you're a Fed?
In pursuit of a white haired man. John Milton. He's travelling with the girl in this picture. Trooper #1 fixes his eyes on the photo of Piper & Frank i his partner's hand. Lowers his weapon.
But, that guy, in the room. He's -

--Dead. Yes. I'd say it's unfortunate, but I'd be lying. World won't miss him. Look, troopers. I need your help with my pursuit of this fugitive. If we, we three, can apprehend him...you are ambitious, correct.
I guess...
Yes, we are...

Wasn't actually a question. I can tell you are. Success will mean promotion. Pay raise. I guarantee it. Now we are going to hunt this Milton, we are going to find the GTO he's driving and when we find him, you will shoot to kill. You understand? Shoot. To. Kill. The Accountant's voice is velvet. Hypnotic. Seductive. Purposeful. Promising glory with a hint of damnation. 32.
That's against protocol...

This man is highly dangerous. He has killed and will kill again. He must be taken down on sight. The time it takes you to follow your protocols is the time it takes him to end your life. The Accountant crosses to the cruiser's back door, the co disappearing back into his pocket.
Shall we?

We're staring into two motel rooms. We're cheating...the wall that divides the rooms...divides the screen. The bed in each room butted up against the dividing wall. On one side we see Piper, on her back. Still clothed. At her feet, on his knees and completely naked, the Busboy. He's painting her toenails. On the other side we see Milton, on his back. Candy ridin him like a fucking big-tittied stallion. Candy is a SCREA The Busboy looks up, timidly. Then...
Uh, are we gonna do it?

Well, I don't know, baby. Depends on how well you do those nails. Now pay attention. You might need to redo that one. He hunches over and gets back to work. As Piper ties her hair up with a pink bandanna. Candy's SEX SCREAMS are starting to annoy the fuck out of her. She twists around with frustration and POUNDS the wall.
Shut the fuck up in there! Milton twist and POUNDS the wall right back. 33.
You shut the fuck up! That's it! Piper swings her legs off of the bed. Busboy wasn't prepa and topples backwards to the floor.
(giggles) Oh! Sorry, I didn't mean... She stops. Stares. Movement. Someone stepped quickly away from the window.

location: BULL BY THE BALLS BAR AND GRILL

text: Piper BURSTS into the room ready to kick ass and take nam But...the place is...empty. Food still on the plates. Bee in the mugs. The TV over the bar is still on. We see footage of a Nevada Amber Alert. aBaby Tabitha sti missinga A photo of a baby in pink onesie. Then appearing beside it...the photo of Jonah King.

...issued an all points bulletin for Jonah King's immediate detention in connection with the murder of a young married couple in Loveland, Colorado. Their infant girl is believed to have been abducted by this religious sect. A nation-wide Amber Alert is now in full effect. Piper stares at the TV for a moment, then scans the bar. What the fuck? She eyes the EXIT sign where an assortment of athletic equipment hangs from the wall.
Piper exits with a hockey stick. A few cars are left in the lot. A black Chevy van with fl stands out, parked in front of a barn/storage building. Piper crosses to a window in the bar/motel. 34.
Busboy sits on Piper's bed. Still naked. He holds her nai polish to his nose. Sniffs. Jerks his head back.
Imbecile.

Piper spins, grips the hockey stick. No one. The cars are empty. The barn looks undistur... A light GLOWS within the barn, bleeding through the wood slats. Then... CRREEEEEEEK...barn door slowly swings open. ...revealing THREE SILHOUETTES backlit by a hanging lamp. One holds a shovel. The other heaves an ax over his shoulder. The third holds a shotgun. The side door on the flamed van slides open. TWO SILHOUET step out. Baseball bat and machete.
Piper spins as THREE DARK FIGURES appear around the side the bar/motel. Sledge hammer, iron pipe, sickle. Surrounded. All seven begin walking toward her. Piper rushes back inside.
Still empty. Piper turns toward the door marked aMotel Guestsa then hesitates. Instead she dives under a booth table...as... The back door opens.
LEGS. Three sets. Beat up sneakers. Work boots. Cowboy boots with a duct tape patch. A door opens. Piper sucks in breath. More legs appear.
Shadows approach the desk counter near the aMotel Guestsa door. There's an open guest book on the counter top.
As a weathered hand comes into view. A finger traces down the last two entries. Piper Lee RM 111 John Milton RM 112
Candy's still on top. She is, as we say in the fuck industry, aclosea.

Close'm'close'm'close'm'close. Suddenly Milton's head jerks toward the door. His hand shoots beneath his pillow as-- The door BURSTS OPEN! MAN WITH AN IRON PIPE held high rushes into the room. Milton comes up with a 357 hand cannon!

IRON PIPE is BLOWN backwards into MAN WITH MACHETE! Milton thrusts upright, suddenly Candy finds herself bene him as -- Machete HEAVES Iron Pipe to the side and rushes toward Mi as -- KAFOOM! He's blown off his feet!

The window shatters as a MAN WITH BASEBALL BAT dives, hit rolls and comes up swinging! Milton snakes an arm beneath Candy and rolls from the bed with her! As they fall-- The bat SLAMS onto the mattress just missing them as --
Milton turns Baseball Bat's head into a canoe! Milton on bottom again as they crash to the floor, still intertwined.

The door adjoining Milton and Piper's room EXPLODES open his feet! MAN WITH AXE and MAN WITH SHOTGUN enter! Milton, presses Candy's face into his chest, twisting his body to shield her as his 357 THUNDERS twice! Shotgun's eye vaporizes in a mist! He drops to his knees. Man with Axe clutches his throat...blood gushing...turns flees back into the adjoining room as --
The bathroom door flies open!

Staring under the bed, Cowboy boots with duct tape patch appears. Chamber opens. Shells drop to dirty carpet. Milton rolls Candy over, still connected. Fumbles in his bag on the fl COWBOY with SLEDGE HAMMER freezes at the carnage. Can't s Milton. Because he's hidden by the bed.

Old Man. You know you can't stop what's comin' That little girl's as good as dead. TWO BULLETS slide into the 357. Chamber SNICKS shut. Milton aims under the bed. FIRES! Half the man's foot is blown to hell! He hops then crashe to the floor! He and Milton make eye contact beneath the bed...a nanose before Sledge Hammer's forehead implodes.

Milton rolls Candy beneath him again and raises his head in time to see-- 37. MAN WITH SICKLE enter! He stares at his dead comrades in rage then glares at Mil The glare becomes fear. Milton's already aiming the 357, then --
Sickle smiles, raises the bladed weapon and--
The top of his head SPATTERS BLOOD as a hockey stick cras down from above and behind. Sickle drops to the floor revealing Piper, white knucklin the hockey stick...her face pale.
Thanks. Apparently I shot my wad. Milton stares down into Candy's face. Her whole body QUAKES...CONVULSES. She sucks in breath an opens her eyes.
Jesus Christ. You're the best fuck I've ever had. Piper crosses to the adjoining room.
Hello? Do you mind?! We're... Candy sits up and suddenly takes in her surroundings. She SCREAMS, wraps herself in a sheet and flees from the room
Man with Axe is lying face down in his own blood. Dead. B it's Busboy who draws Piper's attention. Lying beneath bl drenched white sheets. He never saw it coming.
Aw, hell. Milton, in pants, pulls his shirt on, rolls Man with Shotgun's face with his boot. Reloads the 357.
I definitely got their attention. 38.
What. The fuck? You know these people? Milton flings his duffle over his shoulder.
Come on. There are probably more.
Jonah King slips from the bar and rushes toward a parked Sedan. He POPS the trunk and grabs a gym bag. As he cross toward the Driver's side door... The gym bag starts to CRY.

Shhhh. Don't cry little precious. FF-FFUMP! Two doors shut. Jonah King turns, freezes. Our two State Troopers stand near their parked cruiser, staring from Jonah to the CRYING gym bag. For a cop, this is that one in a life time event. A caree maker. News. Media. Leno. Then-- The cruiser's back door opens. The Accountant steps out. ignores Jonah King and the crying gym bag.

Troopers. Remember why we're here. He walks by them towards the front door of the bar. Both Troopers turn and move around the side of building. Jonah King...stares...stunned, he absentmindedly scratche the old scar on his face then leaps into the Sedan with t gym bag, engine ROARS to life.
Milton and Piper exit into the back lot.

Milton, I'm serious! I want some answers! 39. They turn as the SPEEDING Sedan tears onto the highway. A it disappears behind the barn it reveals -- --Man With Shovel. He FLINGS the barn doors open, stares Milton and Piper for a moment then vanishes within.
Yeah, we both want some answers. Milton moves toward the barn as-- The State Troopers walk around the bar. Everyone freezes. The Troopers stare from Piper to Milton, then back to Pip Recognition.
Aw fuck. Milton grabs Piper, places himself between she and the Troopers as they go for their guns.
Come on! Milton pulls the 357 and opens fire! The Troopers, emboldened and fearless, stand their ground shoot back!
Milton staggers, clutches his side. A crimson spot spread across his belly. Piper tries to catch him as he stumbles falls to one knee, his duffle tumbles to the ground, clot spilling from within.

No! The Troopers keep FIRING! Piper stares down at Milton's open duffle. There's a gun lying within the spilled clothes. An ancient six shooter. We get just a glimpse, but we can tell this isn't just an old gun. There's detailed inscriptions scrawled into the metal. The steel of it is thick, tarnished and somehow an She reaches for it. 40.
No! Not that one. He shoves the 357 toward her. Piper snatches it without hesitation, rises and --
Trooper #1's chest EXPLODES. The force spins him...still firing...he SHOOTS Trooper #2 in the ear! Both men crash to the ground. Dead.
The barn doors explode outward as a big Dodge truck power toward the highway, Man with Shovel behind the wheel. Piper turns to find Milton struggling toward the GTO.
What are you doing?!
Have to stop him...
Milton! Those cops weren't trying to arrest us!
No. They weren't. Get in. Milton climbs behind the GTO's wheel.
I'll drive.
You gotta patch me up. I'll drive. Piper fumes but climbs into the passengers seat.
The car RUMBLES to life!
They were trying to kill us!
Yes. 41.
They were trying to kill you.
Yes. Milton floors it! As the GTO fishtails toward the highway
The Accountant steps from the back door of the bar. Hunter and Hunted glare.
Christ. Piper's attention is still on the dead cops.
Christ is right! They start shooting with no warning?! What are you, a murderer? You escape from prison or something? The GTO tears onto the highway!
The Accountant just stands there...fading into the darkne
Well?! Which is it?!
Both. Piper raises the gun, points it at Milton.
What have you gotten me into? I should...I should...Jesus, I just killed a cop! I'm going to prison. Give me one good reason I shouldn't shoot you in the face.
Because I'm driving.
You know what I mean! 42. Milton gestures through the windshield, toward the distan brake lights ahead.
They took my grand-baby. Took my grand-baby and killed my... He breaks off. Looks away.
We see the lighted Amber Alert sign come into view and quickly blur passed. Piper stares at Milton.
The little girl on the news? The baby girl they're looking for? Milton nods.
But the news said the baby's parents were... Piper stops. Milton's eyes glisten. He speaks in a whisper.
Sons of bitches killed my daughter. Piper stares. Milton steadies himself.
So Yeah. I busted out. And I'm gonna get my grand-baby back. I'm gonna get her back and I'm gonna kill every last one of the fuckers.
You want out, I'll understand. Piper considers, then --
They both slam into their seats as the GTO is rear-ended. 43.
It's the Trooper's cruiser. The Accountant, face blank, s behind the wheel.
Milton fights with the wheel as the muscle car fishtails. mashes the accelerator pulling out of the spin!
In the back seat. Now.
What? Why?
Now! Piper scrambles into the back seat as Milton watches the cruiser pull up along side him.
Shotgun. It's already loaded. Piper digs the shotgun from the duffle and heaves it into front seat.
Have the other one ready. Not the 357. The OLD one.
The cruiser pulls up and matches the GTO's speed. After a beat the Accountant turns and smiles at Milton. Milton smiles back, lifts the shotgun, shoves the barrel through the passenger window.
The cruiser's driver's side window explodes.

The Accountant brushes shattered glass from his shoulder. When he looks back at Milton its with a face of arrogance cat toying with a three-legged mouse. He pulls the cruise next to Milton. Matches the GTO's speed. Shouts across.
It's over, Milton. Stop the car.
I can't do that.
Really? What makes you think you have a choice?
I got something I gotta do first.
Then you should have done it a long time ago.
I didn't have to do it a long time ago!
Milton, I will kill that nice woman in the backseat to get to you.
I won't let you do that.
Again. What makes you think you have a choice?
Now. Piper hands Milton the ancient Six Shooter. Milton snatch it, points it across the gap between cars, pulls back the hammer with a thunderous...KUH-THUNK.
This does. The Accountant's eyes widen.

It's as if God tripped, fell and the entire earth shook a result! The recoil nearly rips Milton's arm off. We travel with the slug, fire trailing it, as it SLOMOs toward the Accountant...his eyes continuing to widen...th muscles in his face contracting.
The Accountant cuts the wheel. Hard. He wracks his head around as the slug just kisses his che
The Cruiser SLAMS into the guard rail! The back-end rocke forward as the cruiser goes into a spin. The GTO fishtails away.
Milton fights with the wheel as --
The Cruiser bucks up and over the guard rail.
The Cruiser, spins like a top, helicopters out over the nothingness and plummets to the dry valley below.
And flattens sending out a dusty shockwave in all directi

Milton manages to stop the GTO before it slams into the r The GTO BUCKS and STALLS. He breathes a sigh, then turns and stares in the directio they'd been going. He can just make out the fleeing Cultist's tail lights. 46. The back door opens. Piper leaps out.
Piper! Wait! Milton watches the taillights vanish over a distant ridge He starts the engine...then hesitates...
Piper approaches the destroyed guard rail.
Piper stares into the valley below.
We can just make out the flattened Cruiser in the light o the three quarter moon. No fireball. No smoke. No sign of movement. Just flattened metal.
He's not one of the ones who took your granddaughter, is he?
Milton stands behind her. Shakes his head.
Someone else.
Is there anyone not trying to kill you? Milton stares up the road. Piper considers, then --
Come on. I'll help you. But we're dealing with that first? She points to his blood soaked shirt.
The GTO THUNDERS beneath a starry sky. 47.
The needle hovers at 95 mph.
Piper behind the wheel. Milton, shirtless, his stomach wrapped in homemade bandages, grabs his shotgun, reloads.
My daughter got mixed up with the son of a bitch right out of college.
She knew him? She knew Jonah King, the man they think killed... She stops herself.
She knew him. The world was in a fuckin tailspin and King was preaching quiet revolution. He places the shotgun on the dash, grabs the 357.
It was four months before she realized a quiet' meant hiding in the basement, cutting the heads off chickens.
Jonah King was into voodoo? Milton reloads the 357, slowly, methodically.

Voodoo, the occult, not much he wasn't into. When she told him she was leaving, he helped her pack. Gassed up her car. Cooked her a hot meal. Then while she slept he broke her leg in three places with a tire iron.
Jesus. She twists her pink bandanna nervously in her hands. 48.

She learned her lessen. Was a good little follower for eighteen months. That's when they met with some witch doctor bullshit artist in Chinatown. It was Chinese New Year so the place was wall to wall slants. She saw her chance, stabbed Jonah in the face with a souvenir corkscrew and vanished into the crowd.

Milton. Your daughter was in a cult for two years and you didn't know? Why didn't you help her? Milton grabs the ancient six shooter. It's got real weigh His blood-stained fingers run down the scrolled steel. Th gun almost seems alive. Pops the chamber.
I didn't find out about any of this until...until I got locked up. Only two bullets left. He SNAPS the gun shut. Shoves it into his duffle.
Not gonna reload?
Only had three bullets to begin...
Milton.
Lights ahead. Several. And road flares. There's been an accident. Milton eases the shotgun into his lap.

Several vehicles and an RV block the road. The PASSENGERS scramble back and forth. There's a jack-knifed flatbed, a crumpled Station Wagon and the Cultist's Dodge truck is overturned on the shoulder. 49.
That's his truck.
Stay put. I won't be long.

Milton climbs from the GTO and crosses toward the overtur Dodge. He lets the shotgun dangle at his side, keeping it hidden behind him. TATTOOED GUY and SKANKY GAL stand near the RV with MAN IN LEATHER JACKET. BUSINESS WOMAN paces on her cell phone. Milton glances at MAN WITH WIG sitting in the driver's se of his station wagon, his face in his hands. LADY IN LEOPARDSKIN HOTPANTS kneels beside him. In the passenger seat, BURLY DUDE's on his phone. Watching Milton. There's a couple near the overturned Dodge. TRUCK DRIVING WOMAN gazes into the upsidedown cab. THIN OLD MAN rises a nods as Milton approaches.
I think he's gonna be okay.
Is that right? In a swift move, Milton RATCHETS a shell into the chamber drops to one knee, aims into the cab.
The cab is empty. Somewhere near, we hear a MUFFLED BABY'S CRY.
Realization. Shit. But it's too late. A snub-nosed .38 appears at his temple.
I wouldn't. 50.

Milton! Milton rises slowly and takes in the situation. Tattooed Guy comes up fast behind the GTO. We get a good look at him. It's Man with Shovel. Piper's getting out, doesn't see Tattooed Guy until he's grabbed her. Presses pistol in her ribs.
Hey! Let me go, fucker! She goes to fight but Man in Leather Jacket approaches he with an axe. Burly Dude is with him.
Don't Piper! (to Thin Old Man) Let her go. She's a pain in the ass you don't want. Milton still hasn't let go of his shotgun.

Drop it. Or we'll gut her. To emphasize the point, Truck Driving Woman pulls a Rambo Knife from her purse and smiles a missing toothed smile. Milton drops the shotgun as -- --Man With Wig steps from his car with a scoped hunting rifle. Lady in Leopardskin rises revealing a baseball bat with nails and spikes protruding from the end. Skanky Gal and Business Woman open the RV's door. Jonah King steps from within then smiles down at Milton. cradles a baby in his arms.
Milton, isn't it? Why are you here? Why are you making such a fuss?
Isn't that obvious, you sick fuck? I'm here for her. Milton gestures toward the baby.
What's obvious is that you clearly abandoned your daughter.
JONAH KING (cont'd) Crushed her so completely that she told everyone you were dead. No, Milton, I cannot in good faith hand over this child to you.
But sacrificing her under the full fuckin moon, that's okay?

Okay? Milton, your granddaughter is unbelievably blessed. Look around. The world's on fire. Companies own our governments and the people suffer. Daily. And will continue to suffer until change comes. And change will come. Thanks to your granddaughter, Milton. She will open the door to a new world order.
Your BS don't work on me. You killed my daughter but I won't let you kill my grandbaby.
Your daughter's death was an accident.
No shithead, it wasn't. I saw the whole damn thing. I saw who you are when no one's lookin'. And I saw what that night cost ya. Jonah's armor cracks a little as Milton faces the others.
Milton, you're embarrassing your--

(to the crowd) --What was it three or four days before he showed after killin my little girl? You jerkoffs didn't notice he was walking a little stiff? Milton glances at Skanky Gal and Business Woman.
When's the last time he shared a bed with either of you? Before that night, right? 52. The girls shoot a nervous glance at Jonah.
You forced my daughter onto her knees, you sonofabitch. And she made you pay for it. Jonah stares at Milton in shock. How does he know?

But don't take my word for it. Ask him. Leather Jacket was there. Jonah made him swear not to tell. Jonah lifts a .38 auto from within the baby's blanket and shoots Leather Jacket in the forehead. Piper SCREAMS. The Baby starts CRYING. Jonah shoves the baby into Skanky Gal's arms then swings gun toward Milton.
Put the blonde in the RV. Tattooed Guy shoves Piper toward the RV as Skanky and Business woman climb in with the baby. Jonah aims the gun at Milton's face.
I'm only gonna make this offer once. Give me my granddaughter and I'll let you liv--
He shoots Milton in the left eye! Milton's head snaps, he falls to the ground on his back.
No!!! Tattooed Guy shoves Piper into the RV.
Skanky tries to calm the crying baby. Tattoo shoves Piper onto the travel couch then hands the gun to Business Woma
Please. Try something. 53. Jonah climbs into the RV, closes the door.
Let's go.
You killed him! You bastard you --
Piper's head rocks back as Business Woman pistol whips he
Next time I shoot that mouth right off your face. Jonah gazes out the window as the RV pulls away, Piper's rising behind him.
Milton's body lays there. Unmoving. His one eye staring skyward. Void of life as the RV pulls away, leaving the cluster of cars, the wreck and body of Milton behind.

Man With Wig pops the back of the Station wagon. Truck Driving Woman and Thin Old Man lean in, snatch two shovel Burly Dude drags Leather Jacket's body next to Milton's a the others join him. They gaze down at Milton, his one eye open and unseeing. single tear runs from it. The other, pools blood where th bullet entered. MILTON'S GOOD EYE TWITCHES. Everyone stares. Did they just see that right?

head_text.subj: THE 357 COMES UP IN MILTON'S HAND

text: The bullet RIPS BURLY'S SCALP WIDE. He stumbles back. The others recoil. Burly ROARS, blood streaming from his head wound - charge Milton with the ax. MILTON unleashes rapid fire lead from the 357! 54. Burly's blown back! The others scatter as Milton staggers his feet! He grabs the shotgun, leans on it for support.
AS Milton stumbles to the open passenger door.

MAN WITH WIG comes from the back of the Station Wagon wit the scoped hunting rifle. Aims. BLAM - His shot rips into the GTO, blows the side mirror Milton FIRES back with the shotgun - forcing Man with Wig back behind the wagon.
Milton falls heavily across the front seats. Ties Piper's bandanna around his head, covers his now gaping eye.
Man with Wig hasn't had enough yet. He aims the rifle. Moves into the road. Can't see Milton in the car, but tha doesn't matter. He knows he's there. BLAM.
The windshield SHATTERS. Glass splinters down on Milton. reaches for the keys.

The Cultists jump at the sound of the GTO's GLASS PACKS! Dust rips skyward as the GTO barrels toward them! They scramble, clawing at one another to get out of the w All except Man With Wig. He's playin' hero, lines Milton his sights. But what he sees shakes him to his core.
MILTON, face bloody and twisted with rage. 55. Man with Wig screams, falls, tries to roll out of the way
The wheels pound over both of his legs, SHATTERING them!
Milton flips open the 357 as he FISHTAILS the GTO back on the highway. He dangles the 357 out the window.
Empty shells DANCE onto the blacktop, several SKITTER dow onto the cracked Earth and OS. ANGLE - moving fast, the GTO's wheels consume the frame.
A bicycle tire SKIDS to a stop before us. Then a second.
Two TEENAGERS sit on beat-to-shit mountain bikes, staring
The cratered cruiser lies on its crushed roof, both doors shut. No windows visible. TEEN #1 lights a chillum pipe, inhales. Holds it, passes pipe, then speaks as only a pothead can.
Think anyone's in there?
(inhales, holds, passes) I guess. Doors is still closed.
(inhales, holds) Bet it's sick. Wanna look?
The driver's side door launches right at us! 56. ...nails Teen #2 in the chest, knocking him ten feet backwards where he skids on his back.
Jesus! The Accountant rolls from the cruiser, stands, brushes himself off as he strides forward.
Carpenter and despite what you've heard, prefers short hair. Teen #2 sits up suddenly, coughing.
You...you nearly killed me!
Not even close. I won't see you again until... He tilts his head, as if reading a sign too far away.
...until you're seventy-three. He glances at Teen #1, then --
You, I'll see in three months. And with that the Accountant turns and strides away.
The RV RUMBLES past, running faster than an RV should.
Jonah glances through the back window. Double takes.

A rapidly growing black blotch on the road. In seconds th blotch reveals itself as the GTO ripping up the highway, gaining fast. The baby SCREAMS in the background. When Jonah speaks...it is with wonder.
Look at this. He's still coming. 57.
Who's still coming?
The old man. He's alive.
What? Piper tries to stand. Business Woman backhands her!
Stay down! That's impossible!
You shot him in the face! He can't--

Don't you see? We stand at the crossroads! Did you think we would just idly change the world? The forces of evil challenge us! This is wonderful! We show ourselves to be worthy. I'm so very proud of each one of you. Tattoo and Business Woman beam. Skanky pulls her tit out, shoves it in the baby's face. T kid goes quiet as -- The back glass SHATTERS. Everyone ducks!
Milton leans out the driver's side with the shotgun in hi left hand, his one good eye squinting as --
He fires at the RV! He RATCHETS another shell into the chamber, takes aim then...hesitates...
The front end of a fast approaching vehicle!
Milton's head snaps back as a 90 Corvette slams into the of the GTO.
Lady in Leopardskin behind the wheel, her eyes insane. Behind the Corvette we see a a 92 Lincoln, Thin Old Man driving. Truck Driving Woman in a a 95 Viper.
Milton struggles to pull the shotgun back inside...strugg to keep the big GTO on the road. Distracted by the newcomers...we see what Milton does not
The RV pulls off the road to the left. Milton looks up just as he passes the turn off.
Shit! He SLAMS on his brakes.
Leopardskin's eyes go wide. Survival kicks in. She jerks the wheel.
The Corvette slams into the side of the Viper! The Lincoln cuts hard right. All three cars shoot pass the GTO. Milton cuts the wheel left and floors it!

Piper watches as the bucking RV forces Jonah and Business Woman to turn their backs on her. 59. Piper leaps from the couch, rushes up behind and shoves t toward the shattered back window! Jonah snatches a cabinet, drops his gun! It slides beneath the foldout bed. But Business Woman hits the giant opening and flips up an out of the RV!
Milton looks up as Business Woman SLAMS into the ground a TUMBLES just out of his path. She sits up...dazed. Alive. Milton swerves...just enough...to...
What doesn't explode from the force KUH-THUMPS as the GTO bucks over her body. Milton grits through the pain. A bloody angry smile.
Jonah stares out the back glass in shock.
Oops.
I am patient and forgiving, but that was wrong of you. He turns to her.
I'm going to kill you now. And then I'm going to rape your corpse. So that in the afterlife you might consider your sin this day. Piper CRACKS her knuckles.

Great. Between now and then. I'm'a fuck you up. He takes a step and swings a punch. 60. But she leaps at his face, closing the gap too quickly. H French Manicure digs in. Jonah screams. They both go down The baby WAILS. Skanky crawls into the cramped sleeper-bunk above the dri Pulls the baby with her, tucks back into the corner, away from the battle in the RV's cabin.
Milton is gaining when --
The back glass SHATTERS.
Truck Driving Woman gains on Milton in her Viper. She's being blanketed in dust. BOOM! She fires a .44 Magnum.
The radio and dash explode!
Son of a bitch. Milton snatches the 357, points it out the back glass and opens fire.
Milton's POV A white dot spider webs the Viper's windshield left.
Windshield middle!
The windshield suddenly turns red from the inside as a do appears in front of the driver. The Viper jerks right drifts off of the dirt path!
The Lincoln bursts through the dust cloud behind it. Thin Old Man leans from the driver's window, FIRES. Slugs PEPPER the GTO. Milton spins in his seat.
The RV has pulled ahead and vanishes over a hilltop. Milton FLOORS it!

Piper on top, Jonah's face looks like he ran into a barbe wire fence! He howls in pain and manages to slip a hand around her throat! Piper feels it. His fingers tighten. He shoves her away from him...she can no longer dig into his face. Her arms flail. Reaching for anything. Grasping. Her face turns red. Eyes bulge. Fuck. She claws his shirt open. And there...hanging around his neck is a small corkscrew. Chinese in design. She snatches it and --
Stabs it into Jonah's shoulder, twists it deeper in. He SCREAMS. Releasing her!
Quiet.

GTO rockets over the hill top, clears the ground ten feet The moment the GTO touches down, Milton BRAKES! Milton JOLTS the car into reverse! Tires SCREAM in protes 62. The GTO jerks backwards...climbing toward the top of the in reverse when Milton SNAPS the wheel. The GTO 180s, comes to rest just on this side of the hill Milton casually leans out of the driver's side window wit the shotgun in hand. He points it skyward as--

The Lincoln ROCKETS over the hilltop...and passes directl over the top of Milton. Milton's one good eye zeroes in on the massive gas tank beneath the back of the car. Milton squeezes the trigger. The back end of the Lincoln EXPLODES as -- --The Corvette rockets over the hilltop!
Lady in Leopardskin's face drops.
The Lincoln fireball SLAMS into the ground before her! Lady in Leopardskin shields her face as --
She slams into the burning vehicle and spins out of contr
Milton kicks the car into drive, jerks a 180 and speeds o toward the RV.

Jonah sits up...he pulls at the corkscrew and screams. It won't budge. He glares at Piper. 63. She scans for a weapon. Nothing. She snatches an umbrella from a coat rack. It'll have to do... There's a machete hanging beneath it. She drops the umbrella grabs the machete. Smiles at Jonah
Give me the baby and I'll make the pain go away. Suddenly everyone SLAMS into the side of the RV!
Tattoo pulls the RV back onto Highway 70!
Piper clings to the old stove. She watches in horror as - Jonah's gun slides from beneath the foldaway bed. It slid right up to him. He snatches it. Piper leaps through the door.
Milton is gaining as --
Piper swings out, clinging to the door for dear life!
Piper SLAMS into the side of the RV. She tries desperatel to hold on as -- Jonah leans through the door. Gun in hand.
Goodbye, child.
Hey, dickless. 64.
Jonah looks up. Milton is driving beside them, shotgun in hand, barrel aimed right at Jonah!

But before Milton can get his shot off -- The Corvette SLAMS into the back of the GTO! Milton fires! Blowing a hole in the side of the RV a foot the right of Jonah's head! Jonah leaps back inside the RV. Piper clings on for dear life but she's slipping.
Milton jerks the wheel.

Lady in Leopardskin slows as Milton's GTO goes into a spi There's a smile on her face. She thinks he's lost control Until the GTO does a 180. Milton now driving in reverse. His shotgun pointing through the remnants of windshield.. ...directly at Lady in Leopardskin.
Her head goes buh-bye.
The Corvette swerves off of the road, jumps a ditch and f thirty or forty times.
Piper slips. Slips again. It's over. She knows it. Damn. She falls. FUMP. 65. And lands on the hood of the GTO.
She looks up, through the GTO's windshield into Milton's battered face. He stretches his hand out to her. Piper snags it before slipping off into oblivion.
Got ya. Piper nods, crawls toward the windshield, Milton tries to pull her in as -- KUH-THUNK....CRUNCHCHCHCH... A horrible sound of grinding metal roars from beneath the GTO's hood.

The GTO pulls to the side of the road. Milton leaps out and stares. He can just make out Jonah standing in the back window... holding his granddaughter. Piper eases from the hood. She stares at her bandanna, at the blood on his face.
Jesus, Milton. How? She pulls him close...looks at the back of his head.
It's still in there. The bullet. I can feel it.
But how...how are you still alive? He stares back toward the RV. Just a dot on the horizon n
Ain't got time to die. 66.
I tried, Milton. I tried to get her back.
I know, baby. I know. Jonah only had about twenty followers. We hurt him good today.
Fuckin devil worshipers freak me out. They mess with powers that should be left alone. Turns my shit white.
Powers. It's all bullshit.

No, Milton. It's real. Ghosts, UFOs, bigfoot, that's the bullshit. The Devil and demons? Once those doors are opened you're fucked. Milton rolls his one good eye. Piper turns back to the GTO. Smoke hissing from the engin
What do we do now?
I used to know a guy lived out this way. You got one of them portable phones?
Portable phones? You mean a cell phone? Yeah, in my bag.
As a hand slams into view, fingers with dirt crusted nail curl...dig into the ground.
Man With Wig crawls toward us. He's pale. Eyes dim.
His busted, mangled legs have left a slug trail of blood fluid stretching back to the highway. Left hand hits the ground, right hand digs into the dirt. drags himself forward a few inches.
He's crawling toward the Station Wagon. Someone...somewhere...is HUMMING Wig turns, squints.
Back lit by the early day sun. There's a bounce in his st Wig holds his hand out to the savior as-- The Accountant's smiling face becomes clear.
Scorcher today, huh? He takes a big long swing from an oversized water bottle.
Help me...

Christ on a cracker. My apologies. The Accountant grabs the man by the collar and drags him the shade of the Station Wagon where he flips him around a sitting position. Wig's shirt falls open revealing a pentagram tattooed abo his left breast.
What's that supposed to mean?
It's a symbol of our pact with Lord Satan.
Pact huh? That's cute. Funny he's never mentioned you. Wig stares down at his mangled legs. The Accountant notic 68.
Yeah, those are fucked. Here, have some water. Wig takes the offered water as Accountant kneels before h
Milton's work I take it?
Ran me over with his...how do you...? Who are you?
I'm the Accountant. I'm curious. And I never get curious. What do you people want with Milton?
You're the who? The Accountant smiles, places his hand around Wig's clear shattered femur and squeezes. Wig's body convulses! He SCREAMS.
Does it matter? Milton. Why is he important to you?
He isn't! He's the one chasing us!
Why? Wig stares...searches for an answer. The Accountant snatches a mangled ankle and twists. Wig's body stiffens and he SCREAMS.
Because! Because of what we did. Because of who we took.
Color me curious. What DID you do and who DID you take?
The blood stained pink bandanna. The wind pushes it gentl down the black asphalt.
Milton sits on the GTO's hood. Piper stands between his l cleaning his wound.
Lemme know if I hurt you.
Do what you gotta do. You get used to the pain. Piper pulls a black bandanna from her pack, there are whi skulls on it. She folds it, ties it around Milton's head.

There. That's better. When she moves aside we see she's lined up a skull over h missing eye. A VEHICLE APPROACHES. Milton slides from the hood, steps protectively in front Piper as a banged up wrecker pulls toward them, pulls to side of the road.
From this angle it looks as though an innocent old man an his granddaughter are having car trouble.
From this angle we can see Milton concealing the shotgun behind him. Piper stands close, her hand on the handle of the 357 protruding from his waistband.
As the DRIVER steps out...stands half hidden by the door
Like Piper, the Driver has his right hand tucked behind h back, wrapped around the handle of a .44 Magnum.
Thought you were dead. 70. Now we get a good look at him. His name's WEBSTER. An old black man, as tough as Milton is angry.
Why does everyone keep saying that?
Because he IS dead. Sure as shit supposed to be anyway. Webster and Milton eye one another for a long beat then -
I carried your coffin, old man. I was there the day we put your ass in the ground. Piper stares at Milton. Milton stares at Webster.
Webster, you gonna yank that .44 or just keep stroking it?
That depends. How's this possible?
You heard about my daughter?
I did.
Then you know why I'm back.
Back? Back from where? What. The Fuck. Are you two talking about?!
It true they took the little one? Milton nods. Webster considers for a long beat, then releases the .44.
Put her in neutral. I'll pull the truck around. But Piper can't tear her eyes away from Milton. 71.

location: BULL BY THE BALLS BAR AND GRILL

text: Police tape, half a dozen state and county cruisers. Thre meat wagons and a news van. Humans buzz the scene like insects. The two dead State Troopers lie where they fell. Undisturbed. ROOKIE stands out. Young, county uniform, wi eyed. Very busy at having no idea what he should be doing He scans the ground. His eyes go even wider.
Sarge! Sarge look at this! Rookie squats to the ground as SARGE, leather skin, approaches, stares, frowns.
Yeah?
Cigarette butt.
I see that.
Sarge! It's less than twenty feet from the victims!
And less than three feet from the ash bin. Sarge points to an ash bin filled with sand. Over a hundr cigarette butts salute the sky.
Pay attention, Rookie. But Rookie's attention has quickly OCD'd elsewhere.
Hey!
CAP, an American Indian man walks the crime scene. Jeans, cowboy boots, a aDumbledore Dies On Page 596a sweatshirt. His dress may look out of place but his face and attitude all business. 72.
You! You can't be here! Rookie rushes forward.
Rookie!
Sarge, this joker can't just stomp around the crime scene. Sarge catches up, nods with respect to Cap.
Captain. Sorry about that. Cap looks up then stares at Rookie's feet.
One of yours?
Yessir, I won't let it happen again.
Get him out of here.
Cap, he's green, that's all.
He's standing on evidence. Rookie leaps back revealing two shell casings. Cap kneels, stares.
Suddenly a Unformed Officer leans from within the bar.
Cap! We got a live one.

location: BULL BY THE BALLS BAR AND GRILL

text: Several officers motion Cap behind the bar toward an open cabinet. Cap crosses to the cabinet and kneels. 73. Candy hides within. Naked, hugs her knees. Shivers.
Get me a blanket. And get a medic in here. He turns to Candy, offers a comforting smile.
You're gonna be okay now. I won't let anything happen to you.
He...he killed them. He killed all of them.
Who did?
No. You don't understand, we was fuckin'. He killed them while we was fuckin'. That's never happened to me before, has it happened to you? Cap turns to Sarge who is standing near.
Let's get a shrink in here too. EXT. WEBSTER'S WRECKER - DUSK - EST. A giant barn surrounded by an army of muscle car's laid t rest on cement blocks.

Engines dangle from assorted winches. Auto tools hang fro the walls. Stacks of tires, a pile of carburetors. Webster throws a lever. The wrecker winch lowers the GTO. Piper crosses to the front, pops the hood. Webster joins her, stares at the engine. Frowns.
Engine's shot to hell. 74.
Can you fix it? He leans close, hands caress the engine, searching. Somewhere near a fire CRACKLES. Piper turns.
Milton stands just through the barn doors, stokes a fire within a 50 gallon drum. Flames rising.
I don't...how is this possible?
He loved his daughter.
Lots of daddy's love their daughters, doesn't explain shattering reality.
That one loved his little girl enough to make her hate him. (off her stare) Like Timmy yellin' at Lassie to go home? Piper looks even more confused.

You never watched...forget it. Milton was a bad husband but he was a good father. Used to say it was the only thing he was ever good at. Then we went and got mixed up with the wrong crowd. Power and money and once you're in there ain't no gettin' out. So to keep her safe he vanished the year before she went off to college.
Obviously you got out. Webster glances at Milton for a moment.
The bastards we were workin' for, they were gonna kill us when the job was done.
So the day before, Milton paid'em a little visit. He went alone you see. I didn't know. I would'a gone with him but I didn't know. Webster goes very quiet.
Being a daddy wasn't the only thing Milton was good at. Sumbitch was good at being a friend.
The sun's setting to the West. Milton stands dangerously close to the fire. Stares at the dancing flames.
That fire makin you homesick? Piper and Webster approach with a six pack.
Cold beer? Milton gazes up at the moon. It isn't full but it's close The fire CRACKLES, POPS. He stares at it.

You know the pain and suffering ain't the worse part, right? That's what they tell ya, what they want you to believe. But it's all a big fuckin lie. Nosir, worst part's the goddamn video feed. Webster and Piper exchange a glance.

It ain't about the fire and brimstone. Ain't about your suffering. It's about the suffering of them you love. Cuz you see it. You see it all. In full goddamn detail. And there ain't nothin you can do about it. Milton chunks a 2x4 into the fire. Sparks SWIRL into the
Fuckin son-in-law. He looked like one of them tree-huggin piece of shits. Wore sandals. What kind of man wears fuckin sandals?
But I saw how he died. Fought like a fuckin banshee. Milton goes quiet.

He loved that daughter of mine. Loved that little baby too. He kept fightin long after he should'a been dead. But some people's better at killin than others. Just how they're wired. Milton's finding it harder to speak.

Then them sons of bitches turned on my...nosir, physical pain is nothin compared to watching your baby girl...watchin those fuckers...I'm gonna kill'em. I'm gonna kill'em all. And...and then I'll be done. Milton finally goes silent. Piper makes a noise. Involuntary. Tears stream down her cheeks. She's trying not to sob. Webster looks steely. Determined.
Milton, I can't fix that car. But I can get you were you need to be.
A huge sliding barn door opens into a giant stall reveali 1969 Chevrolet Nova 396 L-78 and a 1969 Chevrolet Camaro. Milton and Piper stare. Webster smiles.
Milt, if memory serves you were always partial to the Nova, yes?
We're staring down over the barn from a distant ridge as hear the GLASS-PACKED RUMBLE of the Nova's engine.
JONAH standing on the ridge top, cell phone to his ear.
Yeah, about that fella who killed all them people at the Bull by the Balls last night. The fella who killed two of your cops. I know where you can find him.
The sun rises to the east burning off the Utah dew.
Milton crosses to the 69 Nova. Stops. Stares.
Piper is curled up beneath a quilt in the front seat.
What are you doing? Piper pops awake, sits up. Already angry.
Fuck are you doing?! Milton stares.
Think you were gonna sneak off by yourself?! Go it alone?!
Uh, no. I need your help. If you're still willing. Piper stares for a moment.
Oh. A beat.
Well if I'd known that I would have slept in a bed! 78.
Milton opens the big barn doors as Piper drives the Nova into the sun light. Webster approaches with a shotgun and a box of shells.

Mapquest says it's an eight hour drive and we got twelve until midnight so we should be fine. And get this, aThe Mother of all thingsa? aBleeds black tears unto those who cut hera? Take a guess what's really bleeding like a stuck pig from the marsh?
Black tears of oil?
Damn right.
Webster, I need you to stay here.
Wha? No. You went alone last time.
I'm not going alone this time. Piper's coming with me.
You take that little girl over me?

Give me the fuckin shells. And the gun. Milton snatches both and hands them to Piper. He then quickly places an arm around Webster's shoulders and walk him out of earshot. Piper places the gun and shells in the backseat then star at the two men. They glance back at her several times. Then Webster nods. Milton returns, slides into the passenger seat.
Let's go. 79. Piper stares out the window as Webster slips quietly into barn. He does so reluctantly.
He's not coming?
He's too old. He'll just slow us down. Get himself killed.
That's what you told him?
That's what Timmy told Lassie isn't it?
Who the fuck is this Timmy and Lassie you two keep talking about?!
This ain't gonna be easy, Piper. I need you. That's no lie. But are you sure about this?
Just drive the damn car.
We see a aWelcome to Nevadaa sign as -- The Nova THUNDERS past.
Milton behind the wheel, Piper has her bare feet on the windshield as she loads shotgun shells into the slits on hunting vest.
I never knew him. Momma said he was a drifter.
I ain't your daddy.
Fuck you if you are. Milton notices something in the rear view. 80.
Shit. Piper sits up, stares.
There's a State Trooper's car way back there. Fuck. There are two. No lights yet but they are coming up fast.
What do we do?
Nothing yet. Not until... The lights come on.
Oh shit. They know.
We can't stop. Milton mashes the peddle to the floor.
Milton, this will never work.
It'll work.
No. It won't. Nobody gets away anymore. In fifteen minutes there will be choppers, we'll be all over the news... She breaks off. Her mouth drops.
As the NOVA tops a ridge, in the distance we see a police barricade. Several State Trooper Cruisers line the roadwa in front of a bridge crossing a dry ravine. Cruisers line the side of the road.
Twenty cruisers. Thirty TROOPERS are set up behind their vehicles, shotguns and assault rifles in hand. 81. Cap, the American Indian Police Captain, stands in front, radio to his mouth.
Just keep driving him to us. We'll do the rest. And make sure you peel off before the fireworks. He lowers the handset, addresses the men.

Gentlemen, these two killed two of our own. I know you'd like them to pay. Therefore, when I tell you to aim for the tires, what I mean is aim for their heads. Are we clear? The men nod with steely determination.
Very good. Please aim for the tires.
The barricade is approaching stupidly fast. For the first time on this adventure, Milton looks...concerned.
Just don't stop.
Too many of them.
Just keep driving.
I'm...I'm sorry I got you into--

--They took your granddaughter, Milton, and now these badge-wearing fuckers are trying to stop you. You crawled out of the Goddamn abyss...and a few fat-assed county Mounties are giving you pause? Your grand-baby needs you. Milton nods. Turns back to the road.
You know what happens to her if they stop us.
You lose the last connection you will ever have to this world. You gotta drive. A scowl crosses his face.
No. You don't just drive. Drive angry! Drive with the motherfuckin' rage that'll take us through that motherfuckin' roadblock!
Sarge from earlier approaches Cap.
He ain't stopping.
Good. Makes our job easier. Suddenly a noise catches them off guard. They turn behind them. Their eyes widen.
A Mack Truck RUMBLES over the bridge approaching from beh them. It's pulling 80mph at least.
Well...this is unexpected.
The Accountant is driving. Calm. Whistling.
Piper and Milton stare.
Uh...what is that?
Get down! 83.
Cap and Sarge scatter! Several Troopers leap or slide dow into the ravine as --
The Mack BARRELS THOUGH THE BARRICADE! Several Cruisers go airborne, sailing directly at us!
Milton cuts the wheel hard as one of the Cruisers ROCKETS right at them.
The Cruiser's front end, hits the blacktop, digs in and f over! The Nova SCREAMS beneath it! The radio antenna SNAPS!
The Accountant smiles. Then cuts the wheel. Hard.
The Mack jackknifes. It slides sideways down the road toward the Nova!
There's nowhere to go!
Shotgun! Piper shoves the shotgun in his hand. He quickly shoves i out the window and -- 84.
QUICKFIRES three blasts!
The hydraulics line BURSTS! Hydraulic fluid bleeds like a stuck jugular! The metal brackets holding the trailer in place...RELEASE
Truck and Flatbed separate! The back of the flatbed catches on a cruiser. The front flips around.
We can just make out the Accountant's face. He's smiling.
The Nova rips through the opening between truck and trail And then blazes past the scattered and overturned cruiser and tears onto the bridge!
Cap staggers into the road, FIRING at the Nova!

Hurry! After them! Those men still near, scramble toward the working vehicle SCRRREEEECH. The Mack skids to a stop behind them, now parallel across blacktop. Driver's side angled back at the bridge. Every gun in the area spins as the driver's side door ope The Accountant steps out, big smile on his face. 85.
You want us to shoot out his tires?
As he smiles and flips his coin high into the air. The surrounding Troopers stare. The Accountant catches it. Holds it high between thumb an forefinger for all to see.
He's holding an FBI badge in the air.
No Goddamn way. No ever-loving way in God's good heaven are you a... The Accountant steps down, thrusting his a badge' into Ca face stopping him cold.
Need you boys to stand down. Captain, you know what this badge means, right? Not a single gun lowers. All trained at The Accountant. Itching to blow him out of his expensive shoes.
Federal Bureau of get the fuck outta my way. You boys have blundered into an on-going Federal case. Now, lower your... He stops, turns...sniffs the air. His focus settles on a YOUNG FACED TROOPER.

You. ANGLE - Looking down on The Accountant surrounded by arme angry troopers. He steps from the truck, nudges Cap aside like he wasn't there. Cap can't believe it. Shot continues, moving down, closer and closer until the Accountant is face to face with a Young Faced Trooper. The kid keeps his gun aimed, nervous, excited and confuse 86. Suddenly the Accountant moves fast. He bats the gun aside snatches the kid's uniform shirt and pulls it open, poppi two buttons.
Hey, Hey!!! Cap! And there...above the kid's left breast...a pentagram tat
It seems you're serving two masters. The kid says nothing stares. Every cop's gun is sighted o the Accountant. He doesn't seem to notice.
Take out your phone and call him. Call Jonah King. Tell him the old man is dead. The kid stares until...
Go ahead, Trooper. Do as the agent says. Rest of you. Stand down. Now! Guns lower. The kid removes his cell phone and dials.
We tear West down the highway as we catch up to the Nova dive down...toward the back glass until --
Piper stares through the back window.
I don't think...why aren't they following us? Milton slips into his hunting vest. A scowl on his face.
They're likely scared of you.
Now what?
Now we drive. 87. We pull back...

...out of the back glass as the Nova speeds up. Faster...faster. The sun suddenly time lapses across the sky. The landscape blurs. Only the Nova and the moving su remain...until the sun dips into the Western horizon and vanishes...replaced by one hell of a bright full moon.
Suddenly our view veers off the highway and rips toward a rocky outcropping in the distance. We slow and drop toward the ground until we're mere inche above the cracked earth...we come to a stop.
A BOOT slams into view.

Milton climbs from the Nova. In the distance we can hear DRUMS. BONGOS. There's CHANTING. And LAUGHTER. Piper rises and gazes at him over the roof. She's scared. Milton shoves the 357 into his back waistband, slides the ancient revolver into a leather hip-holster then he leans and grabs his shotgun.
Stay here. Piper nods. Milton moves toward the jagged rocks in the distance but we can make out the flicking light of fire ahead as Milto moves toward a cliff's edge.
Milton lowers to the ground and crawls to the edge.

A twenty foot drop off to the ravine floor below. The rav is filled with giant oil derricks, like metallic T-Rex's, rising and falling to the SHRIEK of oiled metal. And in the center of this Jurassic gathering, a CROWD of people dance and sway around a giant bonfire. It is celebration, ritual and orgy rolled into one. Brawny cultists erect a makeshift stone altar. On the opposite side of the Oil-Rig ravine - the battered RV sit like a mobile command post.
He was expecting less than twenty followers. There are fo down there. Fuck.

Milton walks slowly back toward the Nova. His head lowere in deep thought. How does one man and a kid take on forty Suddenly a look of alarm crosses his face! He jerks the ancient revolver and aims it ahead.
Piper sits on the hood of the Nova next to the Accountant
Get away from her.
I think not.
