I shoot you with this, you know what it means. No heaven. No hell. You cease to exist.
All the more reason to keep Ms. Piper in close proximity. You are old, Milton. You might miss again.
You can't stop me. 89.

Stop you? Milton, you wouldn't be here without me, you ungrateful shit. That roadblock back there, that would have stopped you. So I want you to drop that iron God- Killer and say thank you. Milton stares. The Accountant, moves. Quickly. With a crisp flick, suddenly there's a blade at Piper's throat. She GASPS.
I said, drop it and thank you. Milton puts up his hand, flings the revolver into the darkness behind him.
Don't hurt her. Th-Thank you.
That's better. He lowers the blade, but keeps Piper close.
You're not the first to get out and I doubt you'll be the last but I gotta know, HOW did you get out with the God-Killer?
I just walked in and took it.
You did not.
I'm an old washed up lifer. Never occurred to'em that I was up to no good.
Wouldn't wanna be you when he finds out.
What's he gonna do? Not let me back in? Now, I gotta know. Why? Why help me? 90.
I know why. It's because of those crazy fucks out there isn't it? They figured something out didn't they? Somehow they know how to summon a piece of hell to earth. The Accountant laughs.
That's cute. You haven't told her?
She don't listen.

Young Ms. Piper, let you in on a little secret. The Dark Lord? Satan? Beelzebub? Lucifer? Simply the warden of a very large prison. Quiet man, actually. Thoughtful. Well read. I happen to know the idea of sacrificing children in his honor annoys him greatly.
Then why? Why help me?
Simple. Like the warden, we all have jobs to do. Getting you here makes my job easier. You get what you want, I get what I want.
Then help me, now. There are forty of them down there. You and I could--
--No.
--No. You want to save her then go do it. If you win, I win. If they take you down, I win. He hugs Piper closer. 91.
You like butter on your popcorn? It's sure to be a grand show. Piper doesn't know what to say. The Accountant glances back at Milton.
You're still here? Milton, the clock is ticking. Midnight approaches.
Then get off my fuckin car.

The RV door flings open revealing Jonah King. He walks wi arrogance through the orgy around him, his followers turn him with reverence. His name is WHISPERED like a secret. He approaches the make-shift stone altar where Skanky Gal holds the baby within a bundle of blankets. HIGH ABOVE: the moon is full and ripe.
It's almost time. Skanky Gal nods. But there is hesitation in her eyes. She grown attached to the baby. Jonah takes the baby, places her on the stone altar.

My brothers and sisters, we have come so far. To this place where the dying earth bleeds its corrupt soul at our feet. From its death, it shall be reborn. As we will be. We who have survived the slings. The arrows. The revulsion of those too weak to believe. We have been cast out. And hunted. But no more. Followers gather, move in unison, dance, writhe, fuck. Tattoo approaches with an old rusty knife. It was probabl elegant once. Now it is worthless. He hands it to Jonah. The Followers GASP in holy awe. 92.

(raising the knife) With this sacrifice, no more will we be shunned. They say the meek will inherit. They LIE. We are not meek. We are chosen. The hounds of perdition will howl at our command. For now we... A HOWLING noise. No. An engine. Distant but thunderous. Heads turn. The sound echoes throughout the ravine then -

The NOVA ROCKETS from the cliff's edge! It plummets straight at the cultists! They scatter! But three are not so lucky, they vanish as giant Chevy turns them to PULP! Jonah's jaw drops. This can't fuckin' be. Skanky Gal, grabs the baby and flees toward one of the gi oil derricks!
Milton wears a mask of rage as he rips the Nova into a 18 his 357 aimed out the window.
He's shooting Cultists in a barrel. But the Nova is the better weapon. He FLOORS it, then LOC the brakes, fishtailing.
The Nova's ass-end veers like a dragon's tail SMACKING cultists aside with BONE-SHATTERING brutality.
Jonah grabs a shotgun from behind the altar, opens FIRE. 93.

Kill him! KILL HIM! Followers produce an assortment of firepower and RIDDLE t Nova with lead! Milton sights Jonah, ready to blow him to fuck, catches t reverend while he cocks the pump. JONAH can see Milton's got him. MILTON grits and pulls the 357's trigger: Click. Click.

Jonah fires a fresh round - barely missing as-- Milton GUNS the engine - SMASHES two followers head on. T fly up the hood, SMASH the glass - but shield him from another frontal assault. Their bodies RIDDLED with lead. The Cultists circle him to get a better shot. A Magnum is thrust into the driver's side window - right Milton's face. He leans back just as the gun is FIRED. Milton yanks the wheel, reverses the Nova - wrenches the Magnum from the fucker's hand. The Cultist hangs on. Claws at Milton. Milton twirls the Magnum, gunslinger style. Jams the barr into the Cultist's face and FIRES. Milton runs down any that get in his way.
The Accountant stands above the battle, Piper at his side He can hear her heartbeat.
You want to help him.
Yes.
He chose you, you know that. Fast car, spunky attitude. He put your life at risk and you still want to help him? 94.
Yes.
Then go. She rushes toward a goat path leading down to the valley below. Suddenly something catches her eye.
The Ancient Revolver. Without the slightest pause, Piper snatches it, spins and aims it right at... The Accountant's smiling face.
Hold on tight. It has quite a kick.
If I kill you, you can't take him.
Someone else will come...someone else always comes. Piper considers, the SOUNDS of battle rising from below.
Piper, he didn't steal that gun to kill me. He stole it to slow me down. He's getting what he wanted. Now, go to him. Before it's too late. Piper turns and scrambles down the goat path.
Milton is ROARING in anger as the NOVA is PEPPERED with bullets and shotgun blasts. GLASS, SPARKS and CHAOS rain down on him. Steam and oil SPEW from the engine.
Ducking in the seat, unable to see, Milton fights to keep

Jonah BLASTS the front driver's side tire, SHREDDING it - 95. The NOVA pitches hard to the left, PIN-WHEELING right int oil derrick. The SCREAM of metal on metal rips through the ravine. The Nova SCREECHES to a halt, tires SPIN, smoke spews, gas dr from the wreck. Jonah and the half a dozen remaining Cultists zero in aro the Nova, guns trained on the driver's door. Jonah nods to Tattoo who approaches close to the ground, reaches out slowly and YANKS the door open.
Tattoo is blown backwards by a shotgun blast!
Kill him! Jonah and his men open FIRE!
Milton SCREAMS as the Nova's cab turns into a warzone. He clambers deep inside the wreck. Praying they don't ignite the leaking fuel. Then the firing stops.
Jonah and his men draw closer and closer.
Soon they'll have a direct shot right into the Nova's ope driver's side door.
The men spin to find Piper standing behind them, ancient revolver aimed into their group. She pulls the trigger.

Jesus wept. The KICKBACK blows Piper off her feet, the gu jerked from her hands. She lands on her back. Hard. The wind KNOCKED out of her. 96. The GOD SLUG slams into a cultist's stomach. It EXPLODES through him, and into the BATTERED RV BEHIND:
The RV goes nuclear - blows shrapnel and cultists helter skelter across the ravine, shredding the remaining five. JONAH is spattered with his men's blood, dives behind the wreck of the Nova.
Well...this has all gone to shit. He steadies himself, grips the shotgun and shoves it into Nova's open driver's side door.
Empty. The passenger door is open. Milton is gone. Jonah spins in all directions. Expecting a trick. But nothing. He rushes around the Nova to find... Milton crawling. Bleeding.
